metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3517 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was found in the minimatch package. This flaw allows aRegular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) when calling the braceExpandfunction with specific arguments, resulting in a Denial of Service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3517` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-minimatch - 3.0.4-4ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-minimatch package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.4-4ubuntu0.1').
